title: Intake for Social Services
description: A family is seeking assistance and a social worker is conducting an initial intake interview.

tasks.description: Create a new case file for the family.
tasks.expected_outcome: The social worker creates a new case in the case management system.

tasks.description: Conduct a needs assessment, gathering information on housing, employment, health, and other challenges.
tasks.expected_outcome: The social worker documents the family's situation and identifies key areas of need.

tasks.description: Identify and refer the family to relevant internal and external support programs (e.g., housing assistance, job training).
tasks.expected_outcome: The social worker provides the family with a list of concrete resources and makes initial referrals.
